dimensions.name: Emotional Growth
dimensions.description: The evolution from reaction to awareness to mastery — the Inner Fire.

badges.name: Ember Aware
badges.description: Write 3 honest reflections about your emotions in your journal. Recognize a recurring pattern.
badges.unlock_message: 🔥 Ember Aware unlocked — you've started recognizing your feelings instead of avoiding them. This is the first spark.

badges.name: Flame Tender
badges.description: Stay emotionally grounded through 3 separate challenging weeks (detected via positive recovery in sentiment analysis).
badges.requirements: 3 emotional recovery periods detected + 10 emotion-tagged entries.
badges.unlock_message: 🔥 Flame Tender unlocked — you stayed open when life asked for courage. That's true emotional maturity.

badges.name: Heart Alchemist
badges.description: Journal through a personal pain point, then document a strength or insight gained from it. Track a measured increase in fulfillment over 14 days.
badges.requirements: 1 pain-point reflection + 1 strength-from-pain insight + 14-day fulfillment increase.
badges.unlock_message: 💎 Heart Alchemist unlocked — you turned pain into wisdom. That's the alchemy of transformation.

badges.name: Soul Phoenix
badges.description: Maintain emotional balance (no negative streaks) for 90 days while journaling with full honesty.
badges.requirements: 90 days of emotional balance + consistent journaling.
badges.unlock_message: 👑 Soul Phoenix unlocked — you've mastered the art of feeling with wisdom. This is rare air.

dimensions.name: Leadership
dimensions.description: Guiding self and others through integrity — the Outer Light.

badges.name: Pathfinder
badges.description: Define and record your personal mission or life goal. Mark at least one concrete next step.
badges.requirements: Create 1 personal fulfillment goal with clear next step.
badges.unlock_message: 🧭 Pathfinder unlocked — you've begun charting your own course. Trust your first steps.

badges.name: Torchbearer
badges.description: Encourage, mentor, or guide another user or peer through at least one growth challenge.
badges.requirements: Document 1 mentorship or support experience with 'support' tag.
badges.unlock_message: 🌟 Torchbearer unlocked — your light now guides others. That's leadership in action.

badges.name: Guardian of Circles
badges.description: Host or facilitate 3+ group reflections or accountability sessions. Track feedback or engagement data.
badges.requirements: Facilitate 3 group sessions with documented engagement.
badges.unlock_message: 🏔️ Guardian of Circles unlocked — you've created sacred space for others' growth. That's true service.

badges.name: Wisdom Architect
badges.description: Sustain leadership impact for 6 months (mentorship, project, or initiative). Must show measurable positive influence.
badges.requirements: 6 months of sustained leadership + measurable impact on others.
badges.unlock_message: 👑 Wisdom Architect unlocked — your influence ripples through others' lives. You've built something lasting.

dimensions.name: Consistency
dimensions.description: Sustained devotion to growth — the Sacred Rhythm.

badges.name: Daily Spark
badges.description: Journal or check in for 5 consecutive days.
badges.unlock_message: ✨ Daily Spark unlocked — you showed up five days in a row. Consistency is building.

badges.name: Weekly Warrior
badges.description: Maintain journaling or self-work streak for 7 days with minimal emotional regression.
badges.unlock_message: ⚡ Weekly Warrior unlocked — seven days of devotion. You've built the habit.

badges.name: Momentum Master
badges.description: Engage with the system (journal, reflection, habit logs) 30 out of 35 days in a row.
badges.unlock_message: 🌙 Momentum Master unlocked — 30 days of presence. Your practice is becoming devotion.

badges.name: Eternal Flame
badges.description: 90 consecutive days of reflection, tracking, or progress entries without dropping below 80% consistency.
badges.unlock_message: 🔥 Eternal Flame unlocked — 90 days unbroken. Your practice is unshakable.

dimensions.name: Integration
dimensions.description: The balance of all dimensions into embodied wisdom — The Ascent.

badges.name: Harmony Weaver
badges.description: Keep Emotional Growth, Leadership, and Consistency dimensions all above 70% for 21 continuous days.
badges.unlock_message: 🦅 Harmony Weaver unlocked — all dimensions above 70% for three weeks. Balance achieved.

badges.name: Phoenix Ascendant
badges.description: Reach 100% completion in all three dimensions and maintain it for 14 consecutive days. Reflect on the journey in your journal.
badges.requirements: All dimensions at 100% for 14 days + transformation reflection.
badges.unlock_message: 🕊️ Phoenix Ascendant unlocked — complete embodiment achieved. You are the cycle itself.

life_areas.name: Relationships
life_areas.description: Forgiveness, empathy practice, resolving conflict respectfully.

life_areas.name: Purpose / Career
life_areas.description: Completing goals, mentoring, creating meaningful output.

life_areas.name: Health & Vitality
life_areas.description: Maintaining routine, stress reflection, physical resilience.

life_areas.name: Spiritual Connection
life_areas.description: Deep journaling, gratitude cycles, meditation streaks.

life_areas.name: Creativity
life_areas.description: Creating from emotion, sharing insights publicly.
